com.github.mkolisnyk.sirius.client.ui.controls

Class SelectList

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.mkolisnyk.sirius.client.ui.controls.Control
      • com.github.mkolisnyk.sirius.client.ui.controls.Editable
        • com.github.mkolisnyk.sirius.client.ui.controls.SelectList

  • public class SelectList
extends Editable
    Control extension which wraps Select instance and corresponds to the list objects (e.g. drop-down lists, select lists, multi-select lists).
    Author:
    Mykola Kolisnyk

      Default constructor which binds page the control belongs to and the locator to find the element on page.

                  org.openqa.selenium.By locatorValue)
        Default constructor which binds page the control belongs to and the locator to find the element on page.
        Parameters:
        parentValue - the instance of the page class containing current control.
        locatorValue - the string used to locate current control.

      • selectByText

        public SelectList selectByText(java.lang.String value)
        Performs list item selection by the text specified.

        Returns:
        current object for chain operations.

      • setValue

        public Editable setValue(java.lang.String value)
        Description copied from class: Editable
        Common method for setting values. For extended classes it is supposed to set the value for the writable elements like edit boxes, check boxes, radio buttons. For others it shouldn't do anything.
        Specified by:
        setValue in class Editable
        Parameters:
        value - the value to set.
        Returns:
        current control. It is needed for operation chains.
